page.title: 11Cramlington:Transport
page.content:
Cramlington has very good roads to all the nearby towns. The Spine Road (A189) to Newcastle passes through the town and the A1 trunk road is close by. This is important for all the factories on the Industrial Estates.
For long distance travellers, Newcastle Airport can be reached by car in less than half an hour and there are trains to Newcastle and beyond. There is even a London coach service.
There are very good bus services to all the local towns. At busy times of the day there are as many as six buses per hour to Newcastle, taking different routes through the town.
Burnside F.S.
